name: Zombie Voxel
description:
Zombie Voxel is another game of the Brazilian developer CGN Studios.
Zombie Voxel is a Top Down Shooter game with Wave Survival and RTS game elements.
The game goes through a zombie apocalypse that occurred due to a virus that destroyed 90% of the world population, it is up to the player and his ally Chris to kill these creatures with military support and weaponry and escape as soon as the military rescue arrives!
The game contains 3 weapons, being an LMG, SMG and AR, plus 3 special weapons such as missiles, gun turrets and a drone with explosives. The game system consists of holding waves of zombies until time runs out and you manage to escape. The game contains about 4 maps so far and is still under development.

Controls:
Left Mouse = Move.
Right Mouse = Shoot.
1/2/3 = Select weapon.
Q = Missile Strike.
W = Gun Turret.
E = Drone (Bomb)
